title: My Account is still banned after 14 days
body: It told me that my 14 day ban would be over on August 7, 9;59 pm and its now 10:30, still banned.

replies.body:
Went ahead and took a look at your profile and the Suspension is up at this time! Do your best to stay positive so you don't end up losing the account permanently. One more negative issue and this will happen :( 

I do have some things that could help you with [flaming](http://kotaku.com/a-guide-to-playing-league-of-legends-and-its-ilk-withou-1733446753) and [toxicity](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4713718&page=6#post48754337).
have to go by their server time, not your time.
